channel.title: [317] Drop help [317]
channel.description:
Ok i have a man spawned. He drops bones. But i like to drop em coins to. But every time when he drops. Its only 1 coin. So whats the problem. Or i mean, how to make em drop 15 coins :(
And an another drop help. How i make like:
Drop 1 time only bones Drop 1 time bones and whip :P
Know that you will get 3% credits (to my source) if you help me with this.

item.title: [317] Drop help [317]
item.dc:creator: @roli roli
item.description:
@roli wrote:

Ok im in Npcdrop.cfg
But i have a another problem
It look like this and when i run my server there is an error

[tt]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 1591 1 4087 1 3140 1 4585 1 1305 1 4587 1 1377 1 1115 1 npcdrop = 1 995 5 20[/tt]
So :(

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Drop help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

Go to npcdrops (located in config).
Now search up man ID, you will see:

//general graardor < But you search ‘‘man’’
npcdrop = 1115 35 1 5

Second one (35) is the ID of the item.

The 5 (last one) is the percentage (%) it drops.

Like 100% bones is:

npcdrop = 1115 35 1 100

EDIT: Oh, I see ChoasPkers also posted it before me.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Drop help [317]
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Ok…
npcdrop = 2452 6128 1 4

The 2452 is the i.d of the npc

the 6128 is the i.d of the object I want it to drop

the 1 is the amount of the i.d

the 4 is the percent chance i have of getting that drop.

Read full topic
